alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Webster County through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inavale, or 38 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Cloud around 920 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Guide Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas...and south central Nebraska.
